anya-e0806n3:2_4: samudāye pavattā saddā avayavesupi vattantīti syādisaddo siādike avayavepi vattate,
anya-e0806n3:2_5: vidhiggahaṇañāyenāti “paccayaggahaṇe yasmā sa vihito tadādino tadantassa ca gahaṇa”nti ñāyena.
anya-e0806n3:2_7: Nanu ca “syādisyādinekattha”nti sāmaññena vuccamāne yaṁkiñci syādyantaṁ yenakenaci syādyantena sahekatthībhāvamarahati,
anya-e0806n3:2_10: gato yaññadatto gurukulanti ādopi samāso tyāsaṅkiyāha-‘sāmaññena vuttepi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n3:2_12: tena syādyantena sahataṁ syādyantamekatthambhavatīti sambandhato viññāyati avasīyatīti yassātyādisvattho,
anya-e0806n3:5_0: Ayamettha attho “yato gāmamiccetaṁ sādhanaṁ sādhyaṁ kiriyaṁ taṁbyapadesajānanayogyamapekkhate gatoti,
anya-e0806n3:5_1: ato sādhanaṁ kāra kaṁ sādhye kiriyāya niyataṁ,
anya-e0806n3:5_2: yato ca kiriyā sayaṁ sādhanamapekkhate kiṁ gatoti,
anya-e0806n3:5_3: ato kiriyāpi niyataṁ sādhanametissāti niyatasādhanā hoti ayaṁ yathāvutto niyamo aññamaññāpekkhāvasena
anya-e0806n3:5_4: vattamāno etesaṁ sādhyasādhanānaṁ sannidhāna mattena aññamaññato pakāsatī”ti.
anya-e0806n3:5_6: gato yaññadatto gurukulaṁtyatra tu gāmanti sādhanaṁ passeti sādhyamapekkhate,
anya-e0806n3:5_8: tato ca gāmagatānaṁ vākyantarāvayavānaṁ natthevāpekkhāti na bhavati samāso,
anya-e0806n3:5_10: sambandho hi aññamaññāpekkhālakkhaṇo sambandhyantarato-navaṭṭhitaṁ nivattetvā visese niveseti,
anya-e0806n3:8_0: Bhede visese gāmantetaṁ sāmaññaṁ visesāpekkhaṁ ‘gāmamāsīsati, jahāti, gato’ti,
anya-e0806n3:8_2: gurukula’nti vevamākaṅkhato-bhilasato tassa tu padhānapadassupasajjanapadassa ca yā pariplavamānatā anavaṭṭhitatā
anya-e0806n3:8_3: taṁ visese visiṭṭhe sambandhini nivesento patiṭṭhapento sambandhovānekappakāro kvaci sādhyasādhanabhāvalakkhaṇo
anya-e0806n3:8_4: kvaci pakativikārabhāvasabhāvo kvaci sassāmi sambandharūpo avachindati sambandhyantarato nivattetīti attho,
anya-e0806n3:8_9: tatra na bhavatītyanupadiṭṭho visayavibhāgo ñāyateti bhāvo,
anya-e0806n3:8_10: bāle abudhetu nissāya vicitto samāsavidhānalopādinānekappakāro paṭipattiyā sādhusaddaparijānanatthamupāyo sambhavati,
anya-e0806n3:8_11: paramatthato tu saddantarattā accantaṁ aññattaṁ vākyasamāsānaṁ bhedo,
anya-e0806n3:8_12: na hi vākye diṭṭhapadāni samāse santi,
anya-e0806n3:10_0: Bhedo vākyasamāsānaṁ, ccantaṁ ññattaṁ (potthake) saddantaraṁ yatoti.
anya-e0806n3:11_0: Atoyevāti yato sāmaññena vuttepiyassayena sambandhotena saha tadekatthambhavatīti sambandhato viññāyatīti nāniṭṭhaṁ kiñcipīha hoti,
anya-e0806n3:11_5: Samatthavacanaṁ na katanti pāṇiniyehi viya “samattho padavidhī”ti (pā,
anya-e0806n3:11_7: Samattho pada vidhīti paribhāsāyamayamattho “vidhīyate vidhīyatīti (potthake) vidhi,
anya-e0806n3:11_9: yokocīha satthe padavidhi,so samattho viggaha vākyatthābhidhāne (satti) veditabbo”ti,
anya-e0806n3:11_12: sāmatthiyañcettha dvidhātyupagamyate vākye byapekkhāvuttiyamekatthībhāvo ceti vuttiyamekatthībhāvo vākye byapekkhāceti (potthake).
anya-e0806n3:11_13: Tattha paṭhamassa pariggahaṁ vacanamantarena paṭipādiya dutiyassa pariggahamidāni vacanena paṭipādayamāha- ‘ekatthī bhāvo’ccādi,
anya-e0806n3:11_18: idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti “samāse visesanaṁ visessamanupavīsati ekībhavati visesanaṁ,
anya-e0806n3:11_19: vākye tu visesanaṁ visessato visuṁyevā vatiṭṭhate”ti.
anya-e0806n3:11_20: Dvandasamāsassa tu padānaṁ visesanavisessābhāvepi sakalapadatthappadhānattā ‘rañño go ca asso ca puriso
anya-e0806n3:11_21: cā’ti vākyato ‘rañño gavāssa purisā’ti samāsassa viseso ekatthī bhāvalakkhaṇo bhavatyeva,
anya-e0806n3:11_22: tathāhi tattha vākye bhinnatthanibandhana samuccayapaṭipādanāya casaddo payujjate,
anya-e0806n3:12_2: so ca taṁ vākyaṁ ceti viggahavākyaṁ,
anya-e0806n3:13_0: Tattha sāntarehi sāmyantarehi ca byāvutti chedo,
anya-e0806n3:14_0: ‘Putha bhinno attho yesaṁ padānaṁ tāni puthagatthāni,
anya-e0806n3:14_1: vākye hi rañño puriso tettha rājasaddo rājatthameva vadati,
anya-e0806n3:14_3: vuttiyantu rājapurisotettha rājasaddopi purisatthameva vadatīti dvinnamekatthībhāvo bhavati,
anya-e0806n3:14_4: aññoyevāvayavatthānvito samudāyattho pātubhavatīti tadapekkhāya cekatthībhāvo vuccate,
anya-e0806n3:14_7: Ekatthībhavanaṁ samasananti iminā ekatthanti samāsoti nātthantaranti dīpeti.
anya-e0806n3:15_0: Jahamānāni padāni sakatthaṁ yassaṁ (sā) tathā vuttā,
anya-e0806n3:15_3: sabbathā ca sakatthapariccāge paropakārāsampādanato-nupādānameva payojanābhāvā tassa siyā”ti,
anya-e0806n3:15_7: vākye diṭṭhassupasajjanassa vuttiyaṁ soyevāyantyanvayāvasāyato tadatthāva gatiyāti dassento āha- ‘atha ve’ccādi.
anya-e0806n3:16_1: soyevāyaṁ rājasaddo yo vākyatāle diṭṭhoti vohārīnamekattāvasāyenāsatyapi (rājasaddassa)tthe purisassa visesanambhavissatīti bhāvo,
anya-e0806n3:18_0: Abyayanti yadaññesaṁ pasiddhanti liṅgavacanabhedepi byayarahitattā upasagganipātānaṁ parehi abyayasaññākaraṇato abyayanti paresaṁ pasiddhaṁ,
anya-e0806n3:18_1: tesantvayaṁ samāso abyayatthapubbaṅgamattā anabyayaṁ abyayambhavatīti abyayībhāvo pasiddho,
anya-e0806n3:18_2: asaṅkhyassa sutattā tasseva vibhatyatthādayo visayabhāvena visesanānīti viññāyantītyāha- ‘asaṅkhye’ccādi,
anya-e0806n3:19_1: vibhatyatthe udāharitvāti vibhatyatthavisaye vattamānassāsaṅkhyassa itthisaddena samāsamadhitthīti uvāharitvā,
anya-e0806n3:20_0: Asakapadena anattaniyapadena aññapadena viggaho asakapadaviggaho, tena,
anya-e0806n3:20_1: ettha hi yathā kumbhassa samīpaṁtyaññapadavākye samīpa saddenupasaddavacanīyassa vuttattā upasaddo nappayujjate,
anya-e0806n3:20_2: yathā itthī sūti etthādhisaddavacanīyassā (dhā)ratthassa sattamiyā vuttattā nādhisaddoti ‘itthīsū’ti aññapadavākyaṁ vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n3:21_0: Adhisaddassa pana puratovaṭṭhitassādhāre vattamānassa taṁsamānādhikaraṇena sattamyantenitthisaddena saha samāsoti dassetumāha-‘adhisaddo’ccādi.
anya-e0806n3:22_0: Syādilopoti adhisaddato itthisaddato ca paresaṁ sattamī bahuvacanānaṁ lopoti attho.
anya-e0806n3:22_1: Atta (bhāva) sampattīti sarīrasampatti adhippetāti brahmasaddassa sarīraṁ atthoti āha- ‘brahmaṁ sarīranti,
anya-e0806n3:25_0: Ravimhi rāhugahite, dāresu ca pariggaho”ti nighaṇṭu.
anya-e0806n3:26_1: tampana nissesa matanissesa (potthake) ggahaṇā puthu bhavatītyāha- ‘asesaggahaṇa’nti,
anya-e0806n3:26_4: teneva vakkhati byatirekanaye- ‘taṁ sabbaṁ tiṇasahitamajjho- haratī’ti,
anya-e0806n3:27_3: tampi sākalyeyevāharituṁ sākallenodāharituṁ sāgyadhītetyūdāhaṭanti dassetuṁ ‘tato’tyādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0806n3:28_1: pariggahāpekkhāya samattiyā antato sakāsā sākalyaṁ na bhijjateti sambandho,
anya-e0806n3:30_1: Atthābhāveityatthaggahaṇaṁ itaretarābhāve dhammābhāve ca mā siyāti,
anya-e0806n3:30_4: go asso na bhavatīti hi atthantarattaṁ nisedhīyate,
anya-e0806n3:31_0: Atikkamābhāvetī ettha atikkamāti pañcamiyā asamāsaniddesoti āha- ‘atikkamā’ti,
anya-e0806n3:31_1: na panuppannassa pacchāti iminā atikkamābhāvo nāma uppannassa pacchā abhāvoti dasseti.
anya-e0806n3:32_3: (ati) lahupāvuraṇanti rūpasiddhīti dassetuṁ lahupāvuraṇassātiādi vuttiyaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0806n3:33_2: anusaddena hi yoge vicchāyaṁ “anunā”ti (2-10) dutiyā vidhīyate,
anya-e0806n3:33_3: vākyeyevāssa ca payogo nāññatreti vākyampi bhavatīti maññate.
anya-e0806n3:34_0: Sadiso kikhiyāti ettha kikhiyā pasiddhabhūtāya sādhiyassa sādhanabhāvena gahitāya sadhammattena koci
anya-e0806n3:34_1: sādhiyo sadisoti vuttoti kimidha sadiso appadhānaṁ padhānamevāti attho tathā sati puppapadatthappadhānenāsaṅkhyasamāsena
anya-e0806n3:35_0: Yathā devadattoti ettha yadi samāso bhaveyya,
anya-e0806n3:39_0: Pañcamyāti kasmā vuttaṁ nanu avuttepi tasmiṁ vakkhamānanayena pañcamyantattā pañcamyanteheva samāso viññāyatītyāsaṅkiyāha‘yadipi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n3:41_0: Apasaddayoge niccapañcantassa vikappena samāsavidhānāvābhavanenodāharaṇaṁ dinnaṁ (ettha) pañcamyāti payojanābhāvepi
anya-e0806n3:43_0: “Anu yaṁ samayā”ti (2-1-15) ca “yassa cāyāmo”ti (2-1-16) ca pāṇinino vacanadvayaṁ,
anya-e0806n3:43_5: Vatthuto tu sāmīpyāyāmavantānamaniddesepi sāmatthiyā tadākkhepoti dassento āha-‘samīpāyāmāna’miccādi.
anya-e0806n3:45_4: gaṅgāya lakkhaṇabhūtāya pasiddhāyāmaguṇāya bārāṇasī lakkhīyate yāvāyatāyāmā gaṅgā tāvāyampīti sabhāvato
anya-e0806n3:45_5: tūpamānopameyyabhāvo samāse patīyate gaṅgā viya dīghā”ti lakkhiyalakkhaṇabhāvaṁ vaṇṇeti.
anya-e0806n3:45_6: Evaṁ sati bārāṇasīti paṭhamā nopapajjateti maññamāno āha-‘gaṅgāyā mena yuttā “tyādi.
anya-e0806n3:45_7: Anugaṅgaṁ bārāṇasiyāti bārāṇasiyā gaṅgāyāmo lakkhaṇanti attho.
anya-e0806n3:47_4: akāro ca nipātanā “gotva catthe cā lope”tyatra (3-46) ‘nāññāsaṅkhyatthesū’tyanuvattanato.
anya-e0806n3:50_1: pāraṁ yamunāyāti samāse kate nipātanā ekāro,
anya-e0806n3:50_3: vuttivikappanatthatoti vuttiyā vikappo attho yassāti viggaho.
anya-e0806n3:52_2: pādisamāsaṁ katvāti āsaddassa harasaddena vuttisaddena vuttipadena (pañcikā) kiriyākhyāpyateti asatyupasecanādikiriyāyaṁ
anya-e0806n3:52_5: tato tesaṁ sambhavāyeva samāsantobhūtakiriyā gamyateti maññate,
anya-e0806n3:52_6: tathāhi dadhibhojanaṁtyādo vutte adhyādino saṅkhārakattaṁ bhojanādino ca saṅkhāriyattaṁ patīyate,
anya-e0806n3:53_1: Pāṇiniyehi atthena ‘etassida’nti atthe niccasamāso-bhimato sabbaliṅgatā ca,
anya-e0806n3:53_2: tathā vacanābhāvamiha manasikatvā ‘katha’miccādinā vutti yaṁvuttaṁcodakavacanamāharitvā tatthādhippāyaṁvivarati ‘evamaññate’ccādinā,
anya-e0806n3:53_4: tattheccādinā añña padatthe bhavissatītyetthādhippāyaṁ vivaranto niccasamāsataṁ sabbaliṅgatañca paṭipādayati,
anya-e0806n3:54_0: Atthasaddenāvagatatthatāya etassāti vattumayuttanti ‘etassa attho’ti vākyanivatti siddhāyeva,
anya-e0806n3:54_1: kathañcipi catutthyantā bhinnatthassa samāse katepi tattha virodhamāha- ‘catutthyantasse’tyādi.
anya-e0806n3:55_1: pāṇinīyānaṁ ‘etassa ida’nti atthe samāse kate yo-ttho sampajjati,
anya-e0806n3:55_5: tesaṁ kathādīnanti ettha tesaṁ vāyāmādīnanti vattabbaṁ…
anya-e0806n3:55_6: vāyāmotyādinā vuttattā so ca tannimittaṁ hoteva,
anya-e0806n3:55_7: ayametthādhippāyo “etassa idanti vākye atthena samāse sabbaliṅgatā ca ‘etadattho etadatthā etadattha’nti vāyāmādayo ca samāsatthā honti,
anya-e0806n3:55_8: etaṁ anupādāparinibbānamattho payojanametassa etissā etassāti aññapadatthepi esaṁ padānaṁ soyevatthoti nātthabhedo”ti.
anya-e0806n3:56_2: vimuttiñāṇadassanaṁ anupādāparinibbānatthāya etadattho vāyāmo etadatthā kathā etadatthā mantanā etadatthaṁ sotāvadhāna”ntiādi (tikaṅguttara,
anya-e0806n3:57_0: Pāṇiniyehi “kattukaraṇe kitantena bahula”nti (2-1-32) kitantena tatiyāsamāsavidhānā tattheva bahulaggahaṇena ‘gāmaniggatā’dīsu samāso vutto,
anya-e0806n3:58_0: So kathanti iha ‘bhāvatittatthehī’ti bhāvappaccayanteneva samāsapaṭisedhavidhānā ‘brāhmaṇassa sukkā’
anya-e0806n3:58_1: iccādo so samā sappaṭisedho kathaṁ sijjhatīti attho.
anya-e0806n3:59_2: tasaddenāssa guṇassa parāmāso tasmiṁyeva guṇe avatiṭṭhantīti tadavaṭṭhā,
anya-e0806n3:59_3: guṇeyeva guṇātiṭṭhanti na kadācipi soyamityabhedā dabbavuttayo sukkādayo viya te tadavaṭṭhā guṇā gandhādayo,
anya-e0806n3:59_4: tadavaṭṭhitehi guṇehi chaṭṭhī samassateti vattabbanti attho.
anya-e0806n3:60_1: devadattassāti chaṭṭhiyā gurumhi sāpekkhattepi gurusaddassa sambandhisaddattā sakatthe vākye viya vuttiyaṁ
anya-e0806n3:61_2: sāmatthiyaṁ gamakattañcatthīti padānamaññoññāpekkhālakkhaṇaṁ sāmatthiyaṁ sāmatthiyābhāvepi viggahavākyatthassa gamakattaṁ vā atthīti attho,
anya-e0806n3:61_4: athātra brāhmaṇassa ucce’iccādo sāmatthiyaṁ gamakattaṁ vā natthīti kuto-vasitaṁ,
anya-e0806n3:64_0: Ruḷhittāti samāsasseva kīḷāvācakattena jīvikāya ca paccāya kattena pasiddhattā,
anya-e0806n3:64_1: na vākyassāti ‘uddālapupphabhañjikā’tyādo ruḷhīvasena niccasamāso bhavissatīti tatra kiṁ vacaneneti maññate,
anya-e0806n3:65_0: Ayampana amādisamāso kammadhārayadigusamāsāti sabbepi paresaṁ tappurisasadisattā tappurisā,
anya-e0806n3:65_1: yathā hi tassa puriso tappurisoti uttarapadatthappadhāno,
anya-e0806n3:65_3: saṅkhyāpubbatta napuṁsakattasaṅkhātehi dvīhi lakkhaṇehi gacchati pavattatītidigu.
anya-e0806n3:68_3: ekatthenetīmassa samānādhikaraṇena saha samāso hotīti evaṁ sājjhāhāro attho veditabbo,
anya-e0806n3:69_1: Visessasaddassa visesanena saha samānādhikaraṇattaṁ visesana saddāpekkhanti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo,
anya-e0806n3:69_3: adhikaraṇassa samānattaṁ nāma bhinnānaṁ sambandhīnaṁ bhavati,
anya-e0806n3:69_4: sambandhino ca sambandhamantarena na hontī hoti (potthake) ti visesanavisessānaṁ sambandho viññāyate,
anya-e0806n3:70_0: Saddabyatirekena hettha atthānaṁ visesanavisessabhāvo na sambhavati,
anya-e0806n3:70_1: tathā hi ‘nīlamuppala’nti pañca vatthūni sannihitāni nīlanti nīlattaṁ guṇasāmaññaṁ,
anya-e0806n3:71_0: Tattha uppalajāti guṇajātīnaṁ nīlajātiuppalajābhadhanaṁ (kātantaṭīkā) tāva na sambhavati visesanavisessabhāvo jātiyā nigguṇattā,
anya-e0806n3:71_2: uppalattassa ca uppaladabbe samavāyino samānādhikaraṇattampi natthi,
anya-e0806n3:71_3: uppalajātiyā nīlassa ca guṇassa atthi samānādhikaraṇattaṁ…
anya-e0806n3:71_5: visesana visessabhāvo tu natthi jātiyā anīlattā,
anya-e0806n3:71_9: evaṁ nīladabba uppaladabbānampi aññamaññaparihārena vattumicchitānaṁ na visesana visessabhāvo,
anya-e0806n3:71_12: vuttapaṭipakkhato pana vakkhamānanayena saddānameva sāmānādhikaraṇyaṁ visesanavisessattañca veditabbaṁ,
anya-e0806n3:72_2: bhinnanimittappa yuttānamevāti sāmaññena nīlaguṇādhāre dabbe guṇeyeva vā nīlasaddassa,
anya-e0806n3:72_3: uppalasaddassa ca sāmaññena guṇavati dabbe vattamānattā aññamaññesu bhinnesu saddappavattiyā kāraṇesu payuttānaṁ saddānameva niṭṭhānameva (potthake).
anya-e0806n3:73_0: Samānādhikaraṇattanti nīluppalasaddānaṁ visuṁvisuṁ yoge visiṭṭhadabba vācittassāsambhavā,
anya-e0806n3:73_1: nīlañca taṁ uppalaṁ ceti sāmānādhikaraṇye sannipatite sati sambhavā evaṁ tattha visiṭṭhe vatthumhi pavattānaṁ tesaṁ samānatthatā,
anya-e0806n3:74_0: Nanucetyādi codyaṁ, sīsampātīti sīsapā rukkhaviseso, nayida mevamiccādi parihāro.
anya-e0806n3:75_1: visesavuttīti phalassa rukkhassa ca sāmaññasaddattā bhāvena visese vutti,
anya-e0806n3:75_2: imesanti sīsapādīnaṁ na samodhāritāti na nicchitā,
anya-e0806n3:75_4: avasitā nicchitā vutti yesaṁ sīsapādīnaṁ te avasitavuttayo,
anya-e0806n3:75_5: payatanaṁ vinā tadā pappoti cāti sambandho,
anya-e0806n3:75_8: sarūpamattakathanāyāti vuttatthānampi sarūpamattakathanāya ‘pūpe bahū ānaye’ti yathā,
anya-e0806n3:76_2: yatrapyubhinnamatthi visesanavisessabhāvasambhavo tatthapitāva bahulaṁvacanatova nivatti hoti,
anya-e0806n3:76_4: ettha pana aññepi puṇṇanāmakā santīti byabhicārasambhavā ubhinnampi visesanavisessabhāvasambhave bahulaṁvacanameva samāsaṁ nivatteti,
anya-e0806n3:76_7: atha kho evaṁ vidhepyañña tarasambhavepityavisaddassa attho.
anya-e0806n3:77_0: Yajjevamiccādi paccekaṁ visesanavisessabhāve sati aniṭṭhā pādanacodanā,
anya-e0806n3:78_0: Aññamaññānupakārittāti aññamaññassa visesanavisessatte nānupakārittā sappadhānattāti attho,
anya-e0806n3:78_1: atha dvinnampi appadhānattaṁ kasmā na siyā tyāha- ‘appadhānattepi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n3:78_8: āpubbo labhi hi māraṇe phusane ca vattate,
anya-e0806n3:79_2: na ca nālambhate tasmā guṇo appadhānanti ajjhāharitabbaṁ.
anya-e0806n3:80_7: tadā nīlasaddopi guṇavisiṭṭha dabbavācittā dabbavacanamāpajjatīti imesaṁ na koci viseso”ti,
anya-e0806n3:81_0: Visesanamekattheneti siddhepi papañcatthaṁ paripphuṭatthañca udāharaṇabahuttaṁ dassetuṁ pāṇiniyehi bahuṁ suttitaṁ,
anya-e0806n3:81_3: chinnoca visesanantī sambandho “pubbakāleka sabbadhurapurāṇanavakevalāni samānādhikaraṇene”ti (2-1-49) te samettha suttaṁ,
anya-e0806n3:81_4: tatthekādīnaṁ vuttiyamudāharaṇāni na dassitānyupalakkhaṇatova viññāyantīti dassetumāha- ‘eke’ccādi,
anya-e0806n3:81_5: eko ca so purisocātyādinā viggaho upalakkhaṇattāyeva ca ‘satta ca te isayo ca sattisayo’ccādikañca daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0806n3:82_2: tesaṁ upamānopameyyānaṁ sādhāraṇo yo dhammo sāmatātena visiṭṭhaṁ yadupameyyaṁ,
anya-e0806n3:82_8: Nanu satthīsaddassasatthiyaṁ vutti sāmāsaddassa tu devadattāya,
anya-e0806n3:82_10: samāno dhammo sāmattādi yassa so sadhammo,
anya-e0806n3:82_13: sāmāsaddopi guṇavacanopi sāmattaṁ vatvā saddhādittavasenābhedopacārena vā devadattāyaṁ vattate,
anya-e0806n3:82_14: nanu ca sāmāsaddassa devadattābhidhāne caritatthatāya satthī guṇena niddiṭṭhātyaniyataguṇappatītippasaṅgo
anya-e0806n3:83_7: pasiddhasādhammiyā sādhyu sādhanamupamānanti katvā satthiyeva sāmaṅguṇena pasiddhā na devadattā,
anya-e0806n3:83_13: Yatratviccādinā bahulaṁvacanasāmatthiyā sāmaññavacaneneva samāsasabbhāvaṁ vatvā aññenāsabbhāvamudāharaṇena
anya-e0806n3:84_1: taṇḍulattampi vatvā dabbe pavatto sāmaññavacano natu bhavatīti sambandho,
anya-e0806n3:85_1: tabbacanassa ‘muni ayaṁ sīho viya visārado’tyādo visāradādisaddassāppayogeti attho,
anya-e0806n3:85_5: visesanavisessānaṁ yathiṭṭhattā niccaṁ sīhādīnaṁ visessatāyeva vacanicchāti pubbanipātattāppasaṅgoti bhāvo,
anya-e0806n3:86_0: Athātrāpi visesananteva samāsappaṭipādane’muni ayaṁ sīhova visārado’ccādo sāmatthiyatova samāsāppasaṅgepi
anya-e0806n3:86_1: upamāno pameyyānaṁ sādhāraṇavisāradattādidhammavacanāppayoge sati tappasaṅgābhāvatthaṁ vacanamārabbhanīyanti
anya-e0806n3:86_3: sāmatthiyatoti sāmaññavacanappayoge sāpekkhattā samāsāppasaṅgoti sāmatthiyaṁ tasmāti attho.
anya-e0806n3:86_6: tathā hiccādinā sāmaññasaddappayoge sāmatthiyato samāsāsabbhāvā suttantarassānārabbhanīyabhāvaṁ sādheti.
anya-e0806n3:87_0: Visesānantabbhāvāti sāmaññassa samāse antobhāvepi tikhīṇattādito visiṭṭhassa sūrassādivacanīyassa visesassa
anya-e0806n3:88_0: Padhānassāti ‘raññopuriso-bhirūpo’tettha abhirūpasāpekkhassa purisassa visesanattenevā visesanaṁ tenevā (potthake) ppadhānaṁ,
anya-e0806n3:88_1: samāsāvayavabhūtaṁ rājānaṁ pati visessabhāvenāviphalitasakatthatāya padhānabhūtassa purisassa.
anya-e0806n3:89_0: Ettha hi gehampati visesanabhāvenāppadhānattepi rājānampati padhānabhūtassa purisassa sāpekkhassāpi samāso hoteva.
anya-e0806n3:90_1: naceha gamakattamatthīti ‘muni sīhova sūro’tyatra tu vākyato yottho patīyate,
anya-e0806n3:90_2: nāyaṁ ‘muni sīho sūro’tyato gamyateti gamakattaṁ natthī-ti attho,
anya-e0806n3:90_3: tathāhi munisīhasaddenevo pamānopameyyabhāvanimittassa visāradattassa sabhāvenevopādānato visāradasaddassa tena sambandhābhāvo.
anya-e0806n3:92_0: Puṇṇatābyabhicārāti puṇṇatāsaṅkhātassa bālādiavatthāvisesassa avināppavattito byabhicārī hi visessambhavati yathā nīlatāyuppalaṁ,
anya-e0806n3:92_2: mantāṇiputtānaṁ anekattāti kevalaṁ mantāṇiyā putto puṇṇoyevāti abhāvā tesaṁ bahubhāvato,
anya-e0806n3:92_3: attano attano gahassa patayoti gahapatīnaṁ bahuttaṁ pākaṭameva.
anya-e0806n3:93_1: Visiṭṭhajātivacanāti vuttaṁ kaṇhasappajātiyā lohitasālijātiyā ca visiṭṭhattā.
anya-e0806n3:94_2: atthināmadheyyoti tacchako nāma koci tannāmo atthi,
anya-e0806n3:94_3: kiriyāsaddoti tacchatīti tacchakoti evaṁ kiriyāya pavattinimittattenopādinno vaḍḍhakīvācī tacchakasaddo,
anya-e0806n3:94_6: Atra kenaci na nāmadheyyassetyādi nopajāyatevātyetadavasānaṁ vuccamānamanudyataṁ nirākattukāmo āha-‘yopā he’ccādi.
anya-e0806n3:95_0: Imassāyamadhippāyo “vuttanayena tacchakasaddassa kiriyā saddassātthavisayāpekkhāyābhāvato visessattābhāvā paccudāharaṇamidaṁ kata”nti.
anya-e0806n3:96_1: nāmadheyyassa kiriyāvācino ca atthābhidhānasāmatthiyaṁ tulyaṁ vā na vā,
anya-e0806n3:96_2: avayavappasiddhiyā samudāyappasiddhi balavati vā navetyetaṁ vicāretuṁ yato nādhikatantyattho,
anya-e0806n3:97_0: Evaṁ maññate- “visesanavisessabhāvacintāyaṁ saddānamatthābhidhānasāmatthiyacintā na yujjate ‘sati sambhave
anya-e0806n3:97_1: byabhicāre ca visesanaṁ sātthakaṁ hotī’ti visesanaṁ maggīyate,
anya-e0806n3:97_4: na vetyetadeva vicāretumadhikatanti katthacipi visesanavisessa sabbhāve samāso hotevā”ti,
anya-e0806n3:97_6: tathāpi vakkhamānanayena samāsasabbhāvā na kāci hānīti dassetumāha- ‘ettha cā’tiādi.
anya-e0806n3:98_3: Evaṁ maññate- “yadīpi samudāyappasiddhiyā sati kiriyāsaddatthavisayāpekkhā nopajāyate,
anya-e0806n3:98_5: sappavisese manusse ca tannāmake nāmadheyyassa tacchakasaddassa pavattisabbhāvā(ti) visesanavisessasabbhāvato samāsappasaṅgo tadavattho yevā”ti,
anya-e0806n3:98_6: na kevalaṁ sappavisesasseva tacchakasaddo nāmadheyyamapitu manussānampīti pisaddattho.
anya-e0806n3:99_4: iti iminā kāraṇena ‘tacchako sappo’ti paccudāharaṇaṁ na yuttaṁ…
anya-e0806n3:100_1: Avacchedakattāti ettha kattunā bhavitabbanti kāḷassāti kattari bhāvayoge chaṭṭhiyā ajjhāharitabbaṁ.
anya-e0806n3:100_2: Pattāpannehi dutiyantassa jīvikampatto jīvikā pannoti samāso ‘kārakaṁ bahula”nteva (caṁ-2-2-19) vihito
anya-e0806n3:100_3: dutiyantena tu tesaṁ samāsatthaṁ suttantaraṁ kataṁ parehi,
anya-e0806n3:100_6: tathā māso jātassāti viggahe parimāṇivācinā chaṭṭhiyantena parimāṇavacanānaṁ kālasaddānaṁ,
anya-e0806n3:100_8: parimāṇaṁ māsādi paricchedo tamassatthīti parimāṇī jātādi.
anya-e0806n3:101_2: pattā jīvikānenāti patto jīvikanti pāṭhena bhavitabbaṁ vacanicchāyaṁ yo-ttho so- ñāpadatthasamāsepyatinno
anya-e0806n3:101_5: Aññattha samāse kate sabbattha “itthiyaṁ bhāsite”ccādinā (3-67) pumbhāvo.
anya-e0806n3:102_2: iminā ca māso jāto-ssāti viggahassa attho dassito,
anya-e0806n3:102_3: aññathāti yadi māso tassa aññapadatthassa jātādino sampuṇṇo na bhātīti attho.
anya-e0806n3:102_4: Ttattavantūnaṁ niṭṭhāsaññaṁ vidhāya tadantassaññatthasamāse “niṭṭhā”ti (2-2-36) suttena pubbanipāto vutto,
anya-e0806n3:102_11: tathāhiccādinā visesanassa sātthakatte samāsabbhāvamabhāve cābhāvaṁ sādheti…
anya-e0806n3:102_12: chaṭṭhīsamāse ‘sati sambhave byabhicāre ca visesanassa sātthakambhavatīti visesanassa sātthakattā.
anya-e0806n3:103_1: chaṭṭhīsamāsappasaṅgo carahi vuttanayena byavacchejja byavacchedakattābhāvena visesanānatthakyā na bhaveyya
anya-e0806n3:103_2: ce vākyenāpi na bhavitabbanti āha- ‘vākyaṁ tvi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n3:103_4: yathā kammaṁ kiriyaṁ payojanañca dhāreti evamayaṁ samāso kammamiva dvayaṁ dhārayatīti.
anya-e0806n3:105_1: Pāmanaputtotipāmā kuṭṭhaviseso assa atthīti pāmasaddā “dissantaññepi paccayā”ti (4-120) nappaccayo,
anya-e0806n3:105_3: yadi hettha ñakāro visesanattho na karīyetha,
anya-e0806n3:105_5: tathā ca satyuttarapade parato pāmanasadde nakārassāpi ṭo
anya-e0806n3:106_1: nanu ciha samāsavidhimhi ña kāroccāraṇā ña lopa rahitassa samāso na bhavatīti vattumucitaṁ,
anya-e0806n3:106_2: na tu “ṭa nañssā”ti visesanatthoti ññakāro etthova visesanattho,
anya-e0806n3:106_4: kintviha samāsavidhimhi ña kārassa byavacchajjaṁ na dissate.
anya-e0806n3:107_0: Pariyudāsavuttīti pari tulitamuggayha nisedhanīyassa asanaṁ khepanaṁ vajjanaṁ pariyudāso,
anya-e0806n3:107_1: tena pariyudāsena visiṭṭhe-tthe vutti asseti pariyudāsavutti,
anya-e0806n3:107_2: pasajjappaṭisedhavuttīti paṭisedhanīyameva pasajja patvā taṁsadisamanapekkhiya nisedho,
anya-e0806n3:108_0: Yattha brāhmaṇā aññova bhavatītyevaṁ vākyenātthantaravidhānā vidhino padhānattaṁ,
anya-e0806n3:108_2: brāhmaṇassa brāhmaṇassā (potthake) nivattane tadapekkhāyāññassa vidhānayogato sakapadena nañkhyena vidhibhāgī na vuccate,
anya-e0806n3:108_4: pariyudāsanissayinoññasaddasseva vākye payogato’ añño brāhmaṇā abrāhmaṇo’ti,
anya-e0806n3:108_7: añño brāhmaṇā abrāhmaṇoti tattha tattha pariyudāsavuttittā.
anya-e0806n3:109_0: Pasajjappaṭisedhetu paṭisedhassa padhānattā brāhmaṇo na bhavatīti vākyena brāhmaṇassa paṭisedho vidhi atthagammo vākyabhedo,
anya-e0806n3:110_3: tañca ñāṇaṁ dvidhā sammāñāṇaṁ micchā ñāṇañca.
anya-e0806n3:110_5: Tattha sammāñāṇa pubbake abrāhmaṇasaddappayoge natthi nañssa byāpāro,
anya-e0806n3:110_6: na hi tattha tena kiñci karīyati.
anya-e0806n3:110_7: Micchāñāṇapubbake tu vijjate tassa byāpā ro tattha hi tena micchāñāṇappabhavatā parassākhyāyate,
anya-e0806n3:110_9: vinā sadisattaṁ na bhavatīti paṭisedhe sati uttarapadatthasadiso samāsattho jāyateccāha- ‘tattha sadisattaṁ vine’ccādi.
anya-e0806n3:111_2: atha na kassaci ānayanaṁ evampi sabbassevā brāhmaṇasaddassānatthakattaṁ,
anya-e0806n3:112_2: Ayañcettha attho “nañvacanena ivasaddena ca yaṁ yuttaṁ tadaññasmiṁ tappadatthasadise-tthe paṭipattiṁ janeti,
anya-e0806n3:112_3: tathāhyatthasampaccayo loke dissati ‘abrāhmaṇamānayā’ti brāhmaṇasadiso khattiyādi ānīyatīti,
anya-e0806n3:113_5: Anokāsaṁ kāretvāti karaṇena sambandho na okāsena.
anya-e0806n3:113_8: Gamakattavādinoti asāmatthiyepi yatra gamakattaṁ tattha samāso hoteva,
anya-e0806n3:113_9: tato gamakattañca samāsassa nibandhananti yo vadati tassetyattho.
anya-e0806n3:113_12: tathāsati gamakattāiccanabhidhāya bahulādhikārāti kasmāvuttanti āha-‘so ce’ccādi.
anya-e0806n3:114_0: Kehicīti vuttigganthena byavacchinnamatthaṁ dassento āha- ‘kehiciyeva na sabbehī’ti,
anya-e0806n3:114_2: atippasaṅgābhāvatoti suttantarena samāse avihitepi anabhimatatthānampatītiyā abhāvato.
anya-e0806n3:116_0: Syādividhinoti kārakavibhattividhānato visuṁ itthambhūtādīsuvidhānā syādividhītisaṅkhaṁ gatassa syādividhino,
anya-e0806n3:116_3: lakkhaṇādyatthānaṁ samāse guṇībhūtattā samāsato kiriyāsambandhānurūpavibhattiyatthassa padhānabhāvato,
anya-e0806n3:116_5: “Anunā”ti (2-10) vicchāyamanunā yoge dutiyā vidhānasāmatthiyā vākyampi hoti,
anya-e0806n3:118_0: Cīsaddoti ettha cīti iminā cīppaccayantaṁ parāmasati, cīppaccayanta saddoti attho.
anya-e0806n3:120_0: Pītisambhamoti pītiyā sambhamo pītipubbikā paccuṭṭhānāsana dānādivisayā turitatā,
anya-e0806n3:122_5: urasi katvā pāṇinti pāṇiṁ urasi katvā.
anya-e0806n3:124_2: evaṁ maññate “yadi‘syādi syādine’ti vattumicchitekasaṅkhyāsāmaññassa pariggaho na siyā tadā ihānatthaka
anya-e0806n3:124_4: viññāyate”ti teneccādinā idaṁ dasseti “tena yathāvuttena pubbe vutto sabbopi samāso pubbaparānaṁ dvinnaṁyeva
anya-e0806n3:125_0: Yajjevaṁ kathaṁ ‘tadahujāto’ti bahulādhikārena visesana samāsagabbhakārakasamāsena vā sijjhati,
anya-e0806n3:125_3: tena ‘hotu potu pitā puttā’ti hoti uttarapade (yoni) sambandhe parato pubbapadassa “putte”ti (3-65) suttenāttena,
anya-e0806n3:125_4: aññathā dvinnaṁdvinnaṁ samāse sabbattha uttarapadasambhavena “vijjāyonisambandhānamā tatra catthe”ti
anya-e0806n3:125_5: (3-64) “putte”ti ca suttadvayenāttena‘hotā potā pitā puttā’ti āpajjeyya.
anya-e0806n3:125_8: Athāññattheti vutte-ññassa vākyassattheti avatvā padassecceva kasmā vuttantyāsaṅkiyā ha- ‘syādyantasse’ccādi,
anya-e0806n3:125_9: tassevāti sāmatthiyaladdhassa syādyanta padasseva samāso viññāyatīti sambandho.
anya-e0806n3:126_1: tassa aññapadatthassa ye guṇā yāni visesanāni,
anya-e0806n3:126_3: athavā so guṇo yassa so tagguṇo,
anya-e0806n3:126_7: tatthāyamattho “aññapadatthe samāse-ññapadattho visesanena saha viññāyati navisesanarahito”ti,
anya-e0806n3:126_9: yatrāvayavena viggaho samudāyo samāsattho tattheva tagguṇasaṁviññāṇaṁ bhavati,
anya-e0806n3:127_0: Ettha pana bahudhanasaddo purisassa upalakkhaṇabhāvena katattā.
anya-e0806n3:127_1: Abhimatoti pāṇinīyānaṁ abhimato dasannaṁ samīpe āsannā dasannamiccādivākye.
anya-e0806n3:128_0: Parimāṇamevasaṅkhyeyanti parimāṇalakkhaṇameva saṅkhyeyaṁ, tañca parimāṇalakkhaṇaṁ saṅkhyeyañca.
anya-e0806n3:131_0: Saṅkhyānavuttīti tena anativattiyamānatapparicchedaka saṅkhyānarūpa saṅkhāte saṅkhyāne vutti yassā sā saṅkhyānavutti-pañcasaṅkhyā.
anya-e0806n3:132_0: Diṭṭhanteniminā imaṁ dīpeti “yathā pañca parimāṇamesanti pañcakāti ettha parimāṇarūpo-vayavabhedasamudāyasabhāvo
anya-e0806n3:134_0: Pakatippaccayatthabhedasambhavāti iminā paresaṁ pakatippaccayatthānaṁ bhedābhāvassa icchitattā saññāyaṁ sakatthe kappaccayassa vidhānaṁ dasseti.
anya-e0806n3:136_1: tadattho cettha vikappattho vā siyā tadā pana dvinnaṁ gahaṇe na tiṇṇaṁ,
anya-e0806n3:136_4: tadā tu saṁsayassobhayā lambanarūpattā dvevāti vutte tayo,
anya-e0806n3:136_5: tayovāti vutte dve apekkhīyantīti buddhivisayā pañca atthā samāsābhidheyyo honti.
anya-e0806n3:139_0: Nanu ca samānādhikaraṇānaṁ bahubbīhi vutto pāṇiniyehi ‘pañcahi bhuttamasseti byadhikaraṇānaṁ na siyā’ti,
anya-e0806n3:139_1: tathā paṭhamatthaṁ vajjetvā sabbavibhatyatthesu iṭṭho ‘vuṭṭhe devegatoccatra vuṭṭhadevoti na siyā’ti
anya-e0806n3:139_3: byadhikaraṇānampi yathābhidhānaṁsamāsasabbhāvato pañcahi bhuttamassetyādo bahulādhikārā anabhidhānato vā na bhavissati,
anya-e0806n3:139_4: tatoyeva ca pañca bhutta vanto-sseti samānādhikaraṇānampi kvaci na bhavissati,
anya-e0806n3:139_5: tathā paṭhamatthepi kvaci na bhavissati vuṭṭhe deve gato’ti.
anya-e0806n3:140_3: Upasaṅkhyāto “syādyadhikāre-tthikhīrādīnamupasaṅkhyāna”nti (2-2-24-vā) sabhāvato eva nivatto na suttantarato,
anya-e0806n3:140_4: gatatthassāpi hi payoge anavaṭṭhānaṁ siyā piṭṭhapesane viya,
anya-e0806n3:141_3: tasmā oṭṭhova mukhamassāti viggayha oṭṭhamukhoti samāso,
anya-e0806n3:141_5: mukheneva ca pāṇimukhassa sadisattaṁ pasiddhanti sāmatthiyā oṭṭhamukhamiva mukhamassetyattheva tiṭṭhate,
anya-e0806n3:141_7: visayadassanatthāti iminā’kaṇṭhe kāḷo yassā’tyādīkameva vākyanti dasseti.
anya-e0806n3:142_8: aya maññapadatthasamāso parehi bahubbīhīti vuccati tathāhi bahavo vihayo yassa so bahubbīhi,
anya-e0806n3:144_2: Ekaṁ sādhanaṁ ekaṁ kiriyaṁ vā paṭicca cīyamānatāti sambandho,
anya-e0806n3:144_5: Tattha devadatto bhuñjati tiṭṭhati pacaticāti sādhanampaṭicca kiriyānaṁ attarūpabhedena cīyamānatā veditabbā,
anya-e0806n3:144_6: dhave ca khadire ca palāse ca chindāti kiriyampaṭicca attarūpabhedena sādhanānaṁ cīyamānatā veditabbā.
anya-e0806n3:145_0: Soti samuccayo bhavatīti seso, kesanti āha- ‘tulya balāna’miccādi.
anya-e0806n3:146_0: Tulyabalānanti iminā visuṁ padhānabhāvena kiriyābhisambandhā aññamaññānapekkhattamāha.
anya-e0806n3:147_3: etthāyamadhippāyo “ettha gavādīnaṁ visuṁ padhānabhāvenānayanakiriyābhisambandhā tulyabalatā gavādīnaṁ
anya-e0806n3:147_4: vuttakkameneva nayanābhāvā aniyatakkamatā gavādīnaṁ yugapadi nayanābhāvā aniyata yogapajjatā ca hoti,
anya-e0806n3:147_12: taṁ karaṇe yadi gāvopi passati tāpyānayati,
anya-e0806n3:148_1: vuttivayena sāriputtasaddo moggallānattho hoti moggallānasaddo sāriputtatthopīti aññamaññatthe padhānato
anya-e0806n3:148_2: yugapadyadhikaraṇavacane sati cattha samāsoti so-yamadhikaraṇa samudāyo ubhayapadānugataubhayatthavasena
anya-e0806n3:148_3: catubbidhopi yugapadi buddhiyā gayhamāno kadāci ubbhūtāvayavabhedo teneva sābhāvikābhidhānasāmatthiyeneccevamavayavappadhāno ca,
anya-e0806n3:148_4: nanu ca jananamaraṇānīti viruddhānaṁ kathamekenābhidhānanti vuccate- sabbopi saddo payujjamāno (itarī) tarenāvadhāraṇaṁ vattate,
anya-e0806n3:148_6: tathāpi yathā sāriputtamoggallānāti ettha bahuvacanassaññathānupapattiyā yugapadyadhikaraṇavacanatā hotī,
anya-e0806n3:149_0: Bahuttāti kiñcāpi vākye nesaṁ vākyenevesaṁ (potthake) visuṁ bahvatthatā,
anya-e0806n3:149_1: na hi sāriputtamānayāti vutte moggallānassāpi sampaccayo bhavati,
anya-e0806n3:149_2: tathāpi yato vuttivisaye sahabhūtānamevesaṁ visuṁ bahvatthatā,
anya-e0806n3:149_3: tato tattha vacanīyassa atthassa saṅkhyātedena bahuttaṁ.
anya-e0806n3:150_0: Ettha ca kiñcāpi itarītarayogassa samāhārassa ca bhāvarūpattā adabbarūpatā,
anya-e0806n3:150_1: tathāpītarītarayoge tu yathā guṇavaca nānaṁ sukkaṁ vatthaṁ sukko kambalo sukkā gāvīti nissayabhedato liṅgavacanasiddhi,
anya-e0806n3:150_2: tathā taddhammānamabhidhānato nissayato liṅgavacana siddhi veditabbā,
anya-e0806n3:150_3: saṁhatippadhānattācekavacananti yadā bahunnaṁ samudāyo tirohitāvayavabhedo saṁghāto pakkamīyate,
anya-e0806n3:150_4: tadā samāhārocceva saṁhatippadhānattā ekavacanaṁ hotīti attho.
anya-e0806n3:151_31: asi ca satti ca tomarañca piṇḍañcāti viggaho.
anya-e0806n3:151_40: tattha parimāṇasaññānaṁ yathādīgho ca majjhimo ca dīghamajjhimaṁ.
anya-e0806n3:152_0: Khuddajantu siyā- naṭṭhi, athavā khuddakova yo;
anya-e0806n3:153_0: Sataṁ vā pasate yesaṁ, keci ānakulā api.
anya-e0806n3:154_14: Yasmā etehi carati ariyasāvako gacchati amataṁ disaṁ,
anya-e0806n3:154_19: Atisena bhāradvājena kaṭhena vuttaṁ vidantyadhīyanti vāti “aññasmi”ti (4-121) ṇo,
anya-e0806n3:154_24: tehi ajjhenavisese ca purise ca upacārāti sambandho.
anya-e0806n3:155_2: samatho ca vipassanā ca vijjā ca caraṇañcāti viggaho.
anya-e0806n3:155_5: ekajjhayanāni ca tāni pāvacanāni ca tesaṁ,
anya-e0806n3:155_6: dīgho ca dīghāgamo ca majjhimo ca majjhimāgamo ca,
anya-e0806n3:155_7: ekuttaro ca aṅguttarāgamo ca saṁyuttāgamo ca,
anya-e0806n3:156_3: cīvarañca piṇḍapāto ca senāsanañca gilānapaccayo bhesajjaparikkhāro ca,
anya-e0806n3:156_4: tiṇañca kaṭṭho ca sākhā ca palāso cāti viggaho.
anya-e0806n3:157_1: Kāso ca kuso ca usiro ca bīraṇañca,
anya-e0806n3:157_5: hatthī ca goca asso ca vaḷavācāti ca,
anya-e0806n3:157_9: maṇi ca saṅkho ca muttā ca veḷuriyo ca jātarūpañca rajatañcāti ca,
anya-e0806n3:158_0: Ekavīsaticcādino ekañca taṁ vīsaticāti visesanasamāso vā siyā,
anya-e0806n3:158_1: ekañca vīsati ca ekavīsatīti catthasamāso vā,
anya-e0806n3:158_3: “nānusāsanīyaṁ liṅgaṁ sokanissayattā liṅgasse”ti loke napuṁsakaliṅgassehānabhidhānato napuṁsakaliṅgaṁ na bhavissatītyadhippāyo,
anya-e0806n3:158_4: sabhāparisāyāti ñāpakato vā samāhāre napuṁsakaliṅgamatra byabhicaratīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0806n3:159_0: Pubbappayogo-bhimatoti upasajjanasaññakassa syādīti paṭhamāya niddiṭṭhassa samāse pubbanipāto “upasajjanaṁ
anya-e0806n3:159_2: ettha syādīti paṭhamāniddiṭṭhassāsaṅkhyādino pubbamavaṭṭhānato syādineti tatiyāniddiṭṭhassa pacchāvaṭṭhānato
anya-e0806n3:160_0: Parappayogo-bhimatoti heṭṭhā vuttasuttena pubbanipāte patte “rājadantādīsu para”ntīminā (2-2-30) paranipāto-bhimato,
anya-e0806n3:161_2: saṅkho ca dundubhi ca vīṇā ca,
anya-e0806n3:161_4: dhanapati ca rāmo ca kesavocāti viggaho.
anya-e0806n3:161_9: taṁnivāsimhi gahite avanti ca assakocāti ekattenapi viggaho vattati.
anya-e0806n3:161_11: dve ca dve ca padāni dvandānīti hi ubhayatthappadhāno- yaṁ dvandasaddo.
anya-e0806n3:163_0: Atha “samāhāre napuṁsaka”nti (3-20) vijjamāne kiṁ “saṅkhyādī” ti iminā satthagāravakarenāti āsaṅkiya codeti ‘nanuce’ccādi.
anya-e0806n3:164_0: Neti iminā catthetiādinā kataparikappanā na sijjhatīti dasseti,
anya-e0806n3:164_2: saticeccādinā ‘samāhāre napuṁsaka’ntettha visesanaggahaṇe payojanaṁ vatvā ‘saṅkhyādī’ti imassa niratthakattameva thirīkaroti.
anya-e0806n3:169_1: Ekattabyapadeso kātabboti “saṅkhyāpubbo digū”ti (2-1-52) saṅkhyāpubbassa samāsassa digusaññaṁ vidhāya
anya-e0806n3:170_2: tadā pañca kumāriyo samāhaṭāti vākyassātthe vutti siyā pañcakumārītyettha sakapadatthappadhānattā bahuvacanaṁ
anya-e0806n3:170_5: tasmā pañca gāvo sa māhaṭātyetasmiṁ vākye samāsova natthi kammasādhanassānupagamato.
anya-e0806n3:170_7: catunnaṁ pathānaṁ samāhāroti vākye pana atthi,
anya-e0806n3:170_8: samāhārassekattā tu sataṁ yūthaṁ vananti ettha viya sābhāvikamekavacanaṁ siddhameveti viññāpeti.
anya-e0806n3:172_0: Kvacisaddassa payoganiyamanattho “paro kvicī”ti (1-27) ettha vuttanayena veditabbo.
anya-e0806n3:172_1: Avisesena udāharaṇepīti paresaṁ viya “chāyā”ti (2-2-73) suttayitvā vikappena ‘(kuḍḍacchāya) kuḍḍacchāyāti ca “bāhulle”ti (caṁ,
anya-e0806n3:172_2: 2-2-74) suttayitvā niccaṁ ‘ucchucchāyaṁ salabhacchāya’nti ca nodāharitvā sāmaññena ‘salabhacchāyaṁ sakuntacchāya’nti udāharaṇe dassitepi.
anya-e0806n3:174_4: tathāsati napuṁsake so (na siyāti) parikappeti ‘napuṁsakattā ghattameva natthīti cedi’ti.
anya-e0806n3:174_5: Tampi neti yathā vuttampaṭikkhipitvā attheva napuṁsake ghattanti napuṁsakattanti (potthake) dassetumāha-chaṭṭhīsamāsasse’ccādi.
anya-e0806n3:174_6: Napuṁsake ghattassa napuṁsakattassa (potthake) sabbhāvameva samattheti napuṁsakattaṁ hi’ccādinā,
anya-e0806n3:174_11: Etaṁ ghanissitaṁ kāriyaṁ naca yuttanti sambandho.
anya-e0806n3:174_13: na rassassa ettheva laddhāvasarattā paṭhamaṁ tena paviṭṭhe…
anya-e0806n3:174_14: (ghani)ssitaṁ kāriyanti nāyampi doso paribhāsāva senāti mantabbaṁ.
anya-e0806n3:178_0: Sakatthapariccāgena kule pavattattāti iminā chaṭṭhīsamāsassa uttarapadatthappadhānattamāha.
anya-e0806n3:180_1: Itthiyanti idaṁ nāmavisesanaṁ vā siyā paccayatthavisesanaṁ vā,
anya-e0806n3:180_5: Itthiyeva hi esāti liṅgīyati saṅketīyatīti liṅgaṁ.
anya-e0806n3:180_6: Itthiyā esāti pasiddhimato atthassa bhāvo sāmaññaṁ bālayuvattādi lakkhaṇaṁ itthattaṁ.
anya-e0806n3:185_0: Atthesu yesu esā eso etanti pasiddhi lokassa hoti etāni yathākkamaṁ itthipurisanapuṁsakaliṅgānīti lokena vuccantīti attho.
anya-e0806n3:185_1: Evañcakatvā vuccate “liṅgaṁ nānusāsanīyaṁ lokanissa yattā liṅgassā”ti.
anya-e0806n3:185_11: Tato veccādinā paccayatthabhāvino ye dosā tesametthanāvakāsoti dasseti.
anya-e0806n3:185_13: Iminā idaṁ dīpeti “itthattassa paccayatthatte sati padhānattāssa byatirekalakkhaṇāya chaṭṭhiyā ‘kumārittaṁ (devadattāyā’tibhavitabbaṁ,
anya-e0806n3:185_14: tato ca na siyā kumārī) devadattā’ti samānādhikaraṇattaṁ,
anya-e0806n3:185_16: Pakatiyattha visesanapakkhe tu pakatiyā itthattavisiṭṭhaṁ dabbamevoccate,
anya-e0806n3:185_17: āādayo tu jotakatāti tattha byatirekābhāvā chaṭṭhiyā appasaṅgo ca bahuvacanampi anekattāva dabbassa yuttanti
anya-e0806n3:186_3: no papajjate nopapajjeyya (pañcikā) devadattāsaddavacanīyassāpi itthattato abyatirittattā ‘itthattaṁ devadattāyā’ti bhinnādhikaraṇatā na yujjate,
anya-e0806n3:186_5: Samānādhikaraṇattameva siyā itthisaddavacanīyato anaññattā devadattā saddavacanīyassa itthī devadattāti.
anya-e0806n3:187_1: Tabbatotthassāti idaṁ jayādiccādimatānugāminā nugāmī pana (potthake) vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n3:187_2: tathā hi te evaṁ liṅgalakkhaṇa māhu (pā,
anya-e0806n3:187_3: 4-1-3 kāsikāyaṁ) “sāmaññavisesā itthattādayo gottādayo viya bahuppakārabyattiyoti sāmaññāni ca tulyajātiyapadatthasādhāraṇattā
anya-e0806n3:187_4: tāni visesā ca añña maññehi vijātiyeti ca visissante byāvattanteti sāmaññavisesā.
anya-e0806n3:187_6: bahuppakārā byatti yo yesaṁ sāmaññavisesānaṁ te tathāvuttāti–
anya-e0806n3:187_7: (kāsikāvivaraṇa pañjikā.) te hyevaṁ maññante “yathā gottādayo samānajātiyesu sabbesvanuvattante,
anya-e0806n3:187_10: Vicittattā pana sāmaññavisesanissayānaṁ byañjakānaṁ kociyeva sāmaññaviseso kenacideva nissayena byañjate,
anya-e0806n3:187_12: tattha yenatthena itthattameva byañjate na pumattaṁ nāpi napuṁsakattaṁ,
anya-e0806n3:187_13: sā itthiyeva bhavati na pumā nāpi napuṁsakaṁ.
anya-e0806n3:187_19: 4-1-3 kāsikāvivaraṇapañjikā) tasmā pabbato yathā vuttaitthattavato atthassa abhidheyyassāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0806n3:188_0: Atheccādinā yathāvuttadosaparihārāya jinindabuddhinā yadupavaṇṇi taṁ taṁ parikappeti.
anya-e0806n3:188_2: Masimakkhitakukkuṭoviyāti yadā koci aññakukkuṭo aññasmā bhīto siyā,
anya-e0806n3:188_3: tadā vijayino kukkuṭassa mukhaṁ masiyā makkhetvā upanenti so paṭhamaṁ tato bhītopi puna aññoti mantvā yujjhitumussahate.
anya-e0806n3:190_0: Puṁyogena bhariyāyaṁ vattamānatova niyamena “mātulāditvānī bhariyāyaṁ” (3-33) tyānī,
anya-e0806n3:190_1: iminā tvaniyamena bhariyāyamabhariyāyañca inītyaniyamena vattumāha- ‘ārāmikassa bhariyā’iccādi.
anya-e0806n3:192_0: Ttimhāti ettake vuttepi ttippaccayantatoti vacane kāraṇamāha-kevalassa aññapadatthe payogābhāvā’ti.
anya-e0806n3:196_3: Itthiyaṁ vattantīti soyamityabhedavacanicchāyaṁ yadā bhariyāsaṅkhātāyamitthiyaṁ vattante,
anya-e0806n3:196_4: nadādipāṭhāti vutte viññāyati ‘ākatigaṇattā nadādipāṭho honto evaṁ hotī’ti dasseti,
anya-e0806n3:198_0: Puthusaddato saññāyaṁ vīppaccayaṁ samattheti‘puthubhūtā pathavīti hi mahī vuccatī”ti,
anya-e0806n3:198_1: puthubhūtāti hi iminā pathavīsaddassa puthusaddabhūtattaṁ viññāpeti,
anya-e0806n3:198_2: mahī vuccatīti iminā nadādipāṭhā saññāyaṁ vīppaccayattaṁ,
anya-e0806n3:200_0: Parādhikārato paccayassa paravidhināva sāmīpyassa siddhattā sādhīpyavacanassantasaddassa gahaṇamanatthakaṁ
anya-e0806n3:200_1: siyāti mantvāvayavavacano yamantasaddo gayhatīti dassento āha- ‘tassa anto’iccādi.
anya-e0806n3:200_5: Pallavitassa rukkhassa pallavānamavayavattaṁ viya samāsato uttarakālaṁ vidhīya mānassa akārassa samāsāvayavattaṁ na virujjhatīti attho.
anya-e0806n3:202_2: dve aṅguliyo pamāṇamassāti viggahenevaṁ samāso tato mattappaccaye tagghappaccaye vā tassa “lopo”ti (4-123)
anya-e0806n3:202_3: iminā lope kate visesanasamāsā akāroti dassetuṁ ‘katha’miccādinā yaṁ vuttaṁ taṁ dassetuṁ ‘aññapadatthe’ccādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0806n3:202_6: māne paccayalopavasena vināva appaccayena niṭṭhappattīti mantvā ‘aṅgulasaddo vā’ccādinā yaṁ vuttiyaṁ vuttaṁ tattha āsaṅkaṁ viracayati ‘athe’ccādi.
anya-e0806n3:202_7: Dvaṅgulasaddassa pamāṇinivattanato kathañcipi aññapadatthatā siyāti ‘yathā tathā aññapadatthe vattatū’tivuttaṁ.
anya-e0806n3:202_9: tathā sati kimaṅguli saddā appaccayavidhānenetyāsaṅkiya payojanantaraṁ apadisitumāha- ‘sabbatthe’ccādi.
anya-e0806n3:202_10: Aṅgulisaddato appaccaye avihite niraṅguliccādipi siyā tannivattanamettha payojananti dasseti ‘aṅgulisaddanivattanattha’nti.
anya-e0806n3:204_0: Dīgharattantyādo nānusiṭṭhattā liṅgavisesassa kathaṁ napuṁsakattameviccāsaṅkiya codeti ‘nanuce’ccādi.
anya-e0806n3:205_2: samudāyasaddassāpyavayave vutti sabbhāvato ekadesavacano pubbarattādo rattisaddoccāha-‘pubbā ca sā ratti cā’tiādi.
anya-e0806n3:206_1: Pubbā atikkantā ratti pubbarattī(ti ratti saddo) nekadesavacanoti samāsantābhāvo.
anya-e0806n3:208_1: Syādilopassiccādinā sulabhasyādi lopato pyasulabhataddhita lopova alopetīminā parāmaṭṭhuṁ yuttoti dasseti.
anya-e0806n3:210_0: Rattindivaṁ bhuñjatīti payoge ādheyye bhojanasaṅkhāte apekkhite ratyādayo ādeyyasāpekkhā,
anya-e0806n3:210_1: tesampi iminā nipāta nenevātimatā samāsassa siddhīti dassento āha- ‘rattandiva’ntiādi,
anya-e0806n3:212_2: nanu dve aṅgulī pamāṇamassa dārunoccādiṁ mukhyo aṅgulisaddogahitoti sambandho sambhavati kimevaṁ vuccateccāsaṅkiyāha-‘yadipi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n3:212_4: aṅguli saddassa dāruno pamāṇavācakattā vuttaṁ- ‘dāruno sambandho atthī’ti.
anya-e0806n3:212_14: 2-3-29) sissākārādesābhāvā niccamokārantarūpaṁ sampajjatīti parikappiyatassāyuttabhāvaṁ dassetuṁ yaṁ vuttaṁvuttikārena,
anya-e0806n3:212_20: abyañjanantattāti iminā tiṇṇamesaṁ saddānaṁ sakkate byañjanantattameva bodheti,
anya-e0806n3:214_1: iminā sutte kiriya saddābhāvepi vītiharaṇasaddeneva kiriyābyatihāreti labbhatīti dasseti.
anya-e0806n3:220_0: Āparicchedāvasānā na pare parena (potthake) tato paraṁ ṇādikāriyavidhānā.
anya-e0806n3:222_1: atisayena mahantīti viggahe “taratamissikiyiṭṭhātisaye”ti (4-64) tarappaccayo ṇādivuttiyaṁ vibhattilopo.
anya-e0806n3:222_2: Mahattarasaddā ‘nadāditovī” (3-27) mahato bhāvoti vākye“tassa bhāvakammesuttatā ttana ṇya ṇeyya ṇiya ṇiyā”ti (4-56) tto,
anya-e0806n3:228_0: Apavādavisayepīti “vijjāyonisambandhānamā tatra catthe”ti (3-64) imassa apavādasuttassa visayepi.
anya-e0806n3:230_0: Atha vijjāyonisambandhānamityuccamāne vijjāsambandhīnaṁ yonisambandhīnanti kathaṁ vivaraṇamiccāha-‘vijjāyoni’ccādi,
anya-e0806n3:230_1: vijjā ca yoni ca vijjā yonī tāsaṁ sambandho,
anya-e0806n3:230_2: so yesaṁ atthi te hotādayo mātādayo ca abhedopacāreneha vijjāyonisambandhisaddena gayhantīti adhippāyo,
anya-e0806n3:230_4: Te ca ltupitādayoti tasaddena parāmaṭṭhā ltupitādayo ca,
anya-e0806n3:230_5: atthe kāriyā sambhavā taṁvācako saddo gayhati.
anya-e0806n3:236_1: taggahaṇe sati ‘itthiyaṁ vattamāne’ti vuttiganthassa itthisaṅkhāte atthe vattamāneti attho gayheyya,
anya-e0806n3:236_4: Atha itthiyanti ettake vutte kathaṁ taggahaṇaṁ siyāti āha-‘visesane’ccādi,
anya-e0806n3:236_5: ekattheti vuttepi itthiyaṁ vattamāneti ayamattho viññāyatīti itthiyanti vacanamanatthaṁ siyāti samatthamaññathānupapattiyanti
anya-e0806n3:236_8: Byavacchejjābhāvā visesanamanatthakaṁ siyāti ekattheiccaneneva itthiyaṁ vuttiyā (gamma) bhāvatoti bhāvo.
anya-e0806n3:238_0: Vattanaṁ ekasmiṁ atthe adhitthiccādo itthivisiṭṭhe sattamiyatthādo,
anya-e0806n3:238_4: Sāmañña gahaṇatthanti iminā mattasaddassa kasiṇatthe pavattimāha.
anya-e0806n3:240_0: Evanti iminā itarītarayoge catthasamāsaṁ vibhāveti. Jānijāyā,
anya-e0806n3:240_1: saddantarenāti jānisaddena tathāsaddopadiṭṭhena daṁ jaṁ saddantarena ca,
anya-e0806n3:242_0: Nanu sutte‘sare’ti ettakaṁ vuttaṁ‘sarādo’ti kathaṁ laddhanti āha-‘sare’tiādi,
anya-e0806n3:242_2: vaṇṇe parabhūte yaṁ kāriyaṁ vidhīyate taṁ so vaṇṇo ādi yassa taṁ tadādi,
anya-e0806n3:242_5: na visuṁ akārenāti dassetuṁ na ākkhātaṁ anakkhāta “byañjane dīgharassā”ti uttarapadādi sarassa rassatta’nti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0806n3:244_0: Saññāsaddesucātiādinā avayavatthanirapekkhānampi yathākathañci nipphattiṁ dassento sabbesameva saddānaṁ nipphannavācitañcāttano dīpeti,
anya-e0806n3:244_5: na itthi pumanti samāse nipātaneniminā napuṁsakādeso napuṁsakaniddeso (potthake) ti dasseti ‘na itthi’ccādinā.
anya-e0806n3:244_7: khara-vināse cāti hi etehi ‘na khīyati na kharatī’ti atthe “bhāvakārakesva ghaṇa ghakā”ti (5-44) appaccaye’
anya-e0806n3:244_8: na khaya na khara’iti ṭhite khattādesoti āha- na khīyati’ccādi.
anya-e0806n3:246_0: Evanti iminā gacchatīti vākye kvippaccayādiṁ dasseti,
anya-e0806n3:248_0: Tattha tasmiṁ parabhūte, yassa ca jhattanti sambandho.
anya-e0806n3:250_2: Kapotādibhāveti katthaci gharādo kapotavātamaṇḍalikādīnaṁ dassanavasena sabbhāve sati.
anya-e0806n3:252_0: Sakatthe vattamānassa sahasaddassāti vattabbe vattamāno tappadhānoyevāti āha- ‘sakatthappadhānassa sahasaddassā’ti,
anya-e0806n3:254_1: kaṭṭhā tiṁsantu tākalā”ti vacanato āha- ‘kalā kālaviseso’ti.
anya-e0806n3:256_0: Samāno pati yassā sapattinī sapattī iti nipphannānamekadeso ‘pattinī pattī’ti dassitoti vattumāha- ‘yakkhādi tvini’ccādi.
anya-e0806n3:256_1: Vayasaddassa “saravayāyavāsacetā jalāsayākkhayalohapaṭamanesū”ti gaṇapāṭhato akkhaye vattamānasso manādittā okārantattanti dassetumāha- ‘vayo’tiādi.
anya-e0806n3:260_0: Tumhe viya dissantīti tumhādī amhādīccādiṁ “sabbādīnamā”ti (3-86) ā.
anya-e0806n3:262_0: Gabbhenāti iminā kucchigatena gabbhena saha dvihadayattamassāti dasseti, pubbapadeti dusadde.
anya-e0806n3:264_0: Guṇā paṭalā dve padāni assa iti bhavitabbaṁ dve pādā esaṁ dve satāni assa,
anya-e0806n3:264_2: dvinnaṁ satānaṁ dvinnaṁ sahassānaṁ vā samāhāroti viggaho.
anya-e0806n3:266_0: Dvattipattāti paṭhamantā‘pūra-pūraṇe’iccasmā karaṇatthe “bhāva kārakesva ghaṇa ghakā”ti (5-44) appaccaye
anya-e0806n3:268_0: Dve ca tiṁsā ca, dvīhi vā adhikā tiṁsāti viggaho.
